deleteHistoryConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete all plant identification history?
historyDeleteSuccess: Successfully deleted all plant identification history!
historyDeleteError: An error occurred while deleting all plant identification history.
plantKuSolution: PlantKu offers a smart solution for taking care of your hydroponic plants. With Artificial Intelligence (AI) technology, this app can help detect the health of your plants, provide care recommendations, and ensure optimal growth in your environment.
aiDetectionDescription: Our AI can detect various diseases and pests that might affect your plants. Simply upload a photo of your plant, and our system will provide a diagnosis and care steps.
articlesDescription: Explore various articles providing tips and tricks for hydroponic plant care. From beginners to experts, find inspiration and guidance on how to keep your plants healthy and thriving.
guideDescription: Download the complete guide for hydroponic plant care tips and tricks, from beginner to expert. Get inspiration and the right ways to keep your plants healthy and flourishing!
articlesDescription2: We provide articles/blogs that you can access for information on plant diseases and care from trusted sources.
aboutTanamanKuDescription: TanamanKu combines cutting-edge technology with nature's beauty. Our AI is designed to provide easy-to-understand guidance for beginners, yet accurate enough for hydroponic plant enthusiasts. A complete solution for every step of plant care, from seedling to maturity.
logoutSuccess: Successfully logged out! You will be redirected.
passwordMismatch: New password and confirmation do not match!
passwordUpdateError: There was an error updating the password.
name: Name
enterPasswordToDelete: Enter your password to delete your account:
deleteAccountDescription: Deleting your account will remove all your data.
accountDeleted: Account successfully deleted! You will be redirected.
deleteAccountError: An error occurred while deleting the account. Please check your password.
findArticlesAndCareTips: Find articles and care tips to
improveYourPlantsQuality: improve the quality of your plants!
plantDiseaseAndPestsDescription: Articles on plant diseases and pests
invalidImageFile: Please upload a valid image file.

fetchHistoryError: Failed to fetch plant history. Please try again.
aboutUsText1: We aim to be the leading digital platform in hydroponic plant care, utilizing AI technology to provide smart, personalized solutions for plant lovers worldwide.
aboutUsText2: Our platform leverages cutting-edge AI technology to provide personalized solutions for every hydroponic plant enthusiast.
aboutUsText3: We offer care guides tailored to the needs of every type of hydroponic plant, from beginners to experts, through informative articles and blogs.
aboutUsText4: We aim to raise awareness about the importance of caring for hydroponic plants as part of a sustainable, green lifestyle.
inspirationText: TanamanKu is an innovative AI-based platform designed to help you care for your hydroponic plants more easily and effectively. From disease detection to care guides, TanamanKu provides smart solutions accessible anywhere.
